summary: A new, beautiful player home north of Falkreath on the shore of a lake. It has everything you'd need!
descriptionHtml:
[b]STEAM VERSION: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=300099411]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=300099411[/url]



[/b][b]--Summary--[/b] 
An aging adventurer, by the name of Peter, has set out on a journey to explore the vast reaches of Tamriel. As Peter will no longer need the home, he has given ownership over the house to the first lucky soul to stumble upon the note and key left at the doorstep. 

The house provides practically everything you'd need: an enchantment table, a forge, a furnace, an alchemy table, a double bed, and lots and lots of storage. Other items of interest include: 6 mannequins, tons of weapon plaques, and many weapon display cases. As well as a small garden and stable for your horse! 

Take a look for yourself too see its beauty and everything it provides. 


[b]-To Do List-[/b] 
(NOTICE: the house will not be able to support Children because I do not own Hearthfire.) 
-Nothing at the moment. 



[b]-Recommended Retextures-[/b] 
To have the retextures of the house, interiors, and boardwalks/docks that are seen in the images, download the following two mods: 
-[url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12308/?]Sexy Solitude by horrorview[/url][www.nexusmods.com] 
-[url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7241/?]Sexy Riften by horrorview[/url][www.nexusmods.com] 



[b]-Bugs?[/b] 
Comment if there are any bugs, please! 




[b]-Frequently Asked Questions-[/b] 
-[i]How do I get it in my game?[/i] A: Click the big green 'Subscribe' button and it will download it and automatically install it for you the next time you start the game. 
-[i]Does it require DLC?[/i] A: No. 
-[i]Can my spouse/children stay here?[/i] A: Your spouse can.
author: Kyle8497
